title: Rest in peace
author: VD
content_html: Pat Tillman, a former NFL player who swapped a glamorous football career to enlist in the U.S. Army, has been killed in action in Afghanistan. The 27-year-old former football player [for the Arizona Cardinals] was killed in direct action during a firefight in Afghanistan.
content_text: Pat Tillman, a former NFL player who swapped a glamorous football career to enlist in the U.S. Army, has been killed in action in Afghanistan.  The 27-year-old former football player [for the Arizona Cardinals] was killed in direct action during a firefight in Afghanistan.
